RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 32000. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 6 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IN TROUBLED WATERS was bumped between horses at the start, stalked the pace through the turn, rallied three wide to make the lead at the top of the stretch and drew clear under left handed urging. WHYNAUGHTY well placed, rallied late three wide and finished second best. GO GIRL bumped at the start, set the pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then was outfinished. RONNI'S WIND failed to menace. KISS VALENTINA bore in bumping the winner into GO GIRL at the start, pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and weakened late. BETTER HALF trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Ronni's Wind
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Better Half
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Whynaughty
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, late bid 3 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Go Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, set pace upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: In Troubled Waters
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped between horses start, rallied 3w, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss Valentina
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 40. Claiming Purse 20800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 6 Allowed 4 lbs. ClaimingPrice $1 6,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: C MORE PRIDE checked between rivals near the five eighths pole, closed willingly four wide into the stretch, made the lead inside the furlong marker and drew off under right handed urging. THE KID'S PRAYER pressed the pace three wide into the turn, gained a narrow lead before a half, set the pace until deep stretch then was no match for the winner. TITEBLUEJEANS trailed into the stretch and had a mild rally late three wide. HAUGHTY PRAISE pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and gave way late. MISS MARY JEAN bobbled a few strides out of the gate, set a pressured pace along the inside into the turn, had speed into the stretch and faltered late.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mary Jean
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, set pressured pace, inside, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Haughty Praise
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: The Kid's Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, led turn, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: C More Pride
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked early, closed willingly, 4 wide, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Titebluejeans
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, mild rally late 3 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 71. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 25600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 6 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JETTIN PEGASUS was taken outside soon after the start, rallied determinedly three wide through deep stretch under right handed urging and got up in the final stride. APPEALING SENORITA pressed the pace two wide for a half, made the lead, set the balance of the pace and just missed hanging on. TALE OF THE LYON broke in front then drifted out, set the pace along the inside for a half, dug in determinedly but was outfinished. LADY ABRIL failed to menace. CATABOUT with the second flight two wide, faded in the stretch. CAT'S RHYTHM was in tight at the start, stalked the early pace along the inside and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Tale of the Lyon
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, drifted out start, set pace top lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Cat's Rhythm
ENTRY.OWNER: Boots N Bikinis LLC and Vigil Alan
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, stalked pace inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Abril
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Jettin Pegasus
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside, closed willingly, 3 wide, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, took over top lane, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Catabout
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, faded,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Les s Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POT COMMITTED allowed to settle, rallied determinedly three wide through the stretch and was along in time under a hand ride. DECEITFUL bumped at the start, battled for the lead two wide then inside rivals and finished second best. PERMAFROST unhurried early, moved up on the far turn three wide, drifted to the five path and improved position late. QUARANTINO contested the lead three then two wide until deep stretch then faded. TIMESATAPPIN was no threat. GOING IN STYLE bumped at the start, offered a mild bid three wide before a half, had speed into the stretch then came up empty. FOGGY ALBION was never close. FARMHAND matched strides for the early lead along the inside, stopped on the far turn was distanced and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Pot Committed
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, late rally, 3 wide, in time, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Timesatappin
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Permafrost
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, improved position 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Farmhand
ENTRY.OWNER: Patton Luke F and Carrera Linda J
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, stopped 2nd turn, distanced, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Going in Style
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, middle move 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Deceitful
ENTRY.OWNER: Pelfrey Ruth Nicoletta Gerard and Tait Bob
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, dueled 2 wide, inside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Quarantino
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3-2wide, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Foggy Albion
ENTRY.COMMENT: never close

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 6 Allowed 4 l bs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUGER stalked the early pace, moved up steadily two wide through the turn, made the led at the top of the stretch, responded under right handed urging to finish full of run and won as much the best. MON CAMO pressed the pace along the rail and finished second best. VENETIAN DREAM trailed until deep stretch and found his best stride late in the four path. IT'S OFFICIAL reared at the start, moved up outside rivals on the turn then was used up. UOTTALIKEIT set a pressured pace two wide for a half, kept on until deep stretch then stopped abruptly.

ENTRY.NAME: It's Official
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared start, mid move outside, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Mon Camo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Auger
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, steady advance, 2 wide, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Uottalikeit
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2 wide, stopped final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Venetian Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, best stride late, 4path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GONE IN A FLASH prompted the pace two wide for five furlongs, made the lead nearing the far turn, set the balance of the pace and proved best under left handed urging while fully extended. K KID chased the winner two wide and was steadily cutting into that one's advantage late. MASTER OF WAR vied for the lead along the inside into the far turn, dropped back, angled outside the top pair in upper stretch and came on again late. DISTORTED LIMITS failed to menace. LEMON DROP SHOT unhurried early, moved up three wide into the far turn, remained a sharp threat until deep stretch then came up empty. HENRY THE CAT away alertly, set the pace along the inside for nearly five and one half furlongs, kept on into the stretch then gave way late.

ENTRY.NAME: Henry the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 3/8 pole, gave way late inside

ENTRY.NAME: Master of War
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, dropped back 2nd turn, angled out 3wide,came again,

ENTRY.NAME: K Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, gaining, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Lemon Drop Shot
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Gone in a Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, took over 3/8pole, long drive, all out,

ENTRY.NAME: Distorted Limits
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE OCTOBER 6, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 6 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIME HEIST vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch, shifted outside the leader, responded under right handed urging to make the lead late and drew clear. ALL FOOLS DAY never far back, dug in three wide through deep stretch and for up for second. UHAVETOBEKITTENME broke in full stride to set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished. DIAMONDS ENJOY chased the early pace and weakened on the turn. VALIANT THOR hopped at the start and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Time Heist
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, angled out top stretch, rallied 2w, late lead, clear

ENTRY.NAME: All Fools Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, dug in 3 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Valiant Thor
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Diamonds Enjoy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, weakened turn

ENTRY.NAME: Uhavetobekittenme
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace late stretch, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLAME IT ON EDDIE dueled for the lead two wide the entire trip and edged clear late under strong handling. THE DRAKE unhurried early, rallied determinedly in the five path through the stretch and got up for second. SIMPLY VALID battled for the lead along the rail until deep stretch then was outfinished. SUSIE'S KID chased the pace near the inside and failed to respond. RAISE THE PURSES was fractious in the gate and no threat. ZAKARIA hopped at the start, had speed through the turn then wilted.

ENTRY.NAME: Simply Valid
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Susie's Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Blame It On Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, dug in late, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Raise the Purses
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Zakaria
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, speed turn, wilted

ENTRY.NAME: The Drake
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, late rally 5path, up place
